summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3844 for the improvement of Crawford Place from East Olive Street to Olive Way; by paving and grading the same and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47166, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
